albus.predictor.glm

Class GLM

  • java.lang.Object
    • albus.predictor.glm.GLM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copyable<Predictor>, Writable, Classifier, Predictor, ProbabilisticClassifier, Regressor

    public class GLM
extends Object
implements ProbabilisticClassifier, Regressor
    Class for generalized linear models (GLMs).
